methods.contours_utils.my_window_temp(t, sigma, window='gaussian')[source]
Parameters

  • t – domain of the window function

  • sigma – extra parameter of the function, normally controlling the width.

  • window – name of the window, or a function with firm fun((t,sigma)).

Returns

window function evaluated at t.
